author: Pruthvi-ch
body:
PR description:

Implement script to reject hits from the inactive zones along partial wafer cuts of HGCAL. (only reject for partial wafers, Full wafers left unaffected)

PR validation:

Use runTheMatrix test workflows 'runTheMatrix.py -l limited -i all --ibeos'
Validation results presented in: https://indico.cern.ch/event/1297259/

if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

Nothing
title: Implementation of inactive regions along partial wafer cuts
